abstract.p: Correction of chart accompanying July 10 Business Day article on hand-held devices used for wireless data communications

block.p: A chart in Business Day yesterday with an article about hand-held devices used for wireless data communications misstated the range of the monthly prices for two-way paging services offered by three companies. BellSouth Wireless Data's service, with unlimited use, costs $69.95 a month. GoAmerica Communications' unlimited service costs $59.95, and Research in Motion's unlimited service costs $39.95. The price is not $200 to $500 a month.
